verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: In a financial disclosure report] , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: reported] [ARG1: that he reimbursed attorney Michael Cohen for payment to adult film actress Stormy Daniels]
In a financial disclosure report , President Donald Trump reported that [ARG0: he] [V: reimbursed] [ARG1: attorney Michael Cohen] [ARG3: for payment to adult film actress Stormy Daniels]
